  3. Instagram's “Made with AI” label swapped out for “AI info” after photographers' complaints  The Verge
  4. Meta Is Changing Artificial Intelligence Labels After Real Photos Were Marked As AI  CNET
  5. Meta changes its labels for AI-generated images after complaints from photographers  Engadget

item.title: Blocking AI Bots From Scraping Websites Gets Boost From Cloudflare - Decrypt
item.description:
1. Blocking AI Bots From Scraping Websites Gets Boost From Cloudflare  Decrypt
  2. Cloudflare debuts one-click nuke of web-scraping AI  The Register
  3. Cloudflare goes to war with Microsoft, Google, and OpenAI's bots, with blanket free tools to block all crawlers  Windows Central
  4. Cloudflare rolls out feature for blocking AI companies’ web scrapers  SiliconANGLE News
  5. Cloudflare is offering to block crawlers scraping information for AI bots.  The Verge
